title: Online Science Leadership: Strengths-Based Project Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theoretical knowledge and practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: A digitally enabled collaborative learning environment emphasizing social interaction through peer strength-sharing among learners

learning_goals: Learners can objectively analyze their expertise using a strength-mapping tool and derive three or more core strengths
Learners can establish team project role assignments by applying a feedback framework that recognizes peers' strengths
Learners can design innovative solutions for real-world science cases using a strength-based problem-solving model
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
